message:
Someone should start a petition under united nation demanding return of all Bangladeshi army officers from UN peace mission or not accepting any more! How can a army that can't maintain peace in their country, maintain peace in other countries? If they can't stop genocide in their own country, how can they prevent genocide in other countries? If a petition is brought, you will see army officers will realize and stand against Awami League at least to save their back!
-fan
